C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

initContainers.name: wait-for-db-to-be-ready

containers.name: fhir-schematool
args:
echo "Running create-schemas task";

/opt/java/openjdk/bin/java -jar /opt/schematool/fhir-persistence-schema-*-cli.jar \
    --db-type postgresql \
    --prop db.host=${FHIR_DB_HOSTNAME} \
    --prop db.port=${FHIR_DB_PORT} \
    --prop db.database=${FHIR_DB_NAME} \
    --prop user=${FHIR_DB_USER} \
    --prop password=${FHIR_DB_PASSWORD} \
    --schema-name fhirdata \
    --create-schemas;

echo "Running update-schema task";

/opt/java/openjdk/bin/java -jar /opt/schematool/fhir-persistence-schema-*-cli.jar \
    --db-type postgresql \
    --prop db.host=${FHIR_DB_HOSTNAME} \
    --prop db.port=${FHIR_DB_PORT} \
    --prop db.database=${FHIR_DB_NAME} \
    --prop user=${FHIR_DB_USER} \
    --prop password=${FHIR_DB_PASSWORD} \
    --schema-name fhirdata \
    --update-schema

initContainers.name: wait-for-db-to-be-ready
